newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy stock futures contract forges fresh high.
newsitem.headline: Italy stock futures contract forges fresh high.

text.p: The June contract on the Italian Fib30 stock futures index rose to a fresh record high and broke the psychological 20,000 level in afternoon trade.
The June contract was 385 basis points up on the day at 19995 by 1249 GMT having touched 20,055 shortly before.
The contract expires on Friday and dealers said this was helping to power the index higher.
Earlier the blue-chip Mib30 index also broke the 20,000 level, peaking at a record 20,013. It was later trading 1.83 percent higher at 19971.
Dealers say a rally on the bond market on European convergence optimism and the stock derivatives expiries are all helping to drive the market higher.
